entry.title: Forge - HackTheBox
entry.summary: Forge is a very nice medium linux box featuring a web service that allows for local and remote file upload (via URL). After the upload, user is given a random URL to access the uploaded file. This URL upload functionality has a filter that attempts to block SSRFs, but the filter is flawed, and could be exploited to reach another subdomain on the server that foreign hosts are not allowed to dire...
